title: CLI: cannot explicitly set boolean (reckless) or None (reckless or fulfilled)

labels.name: severity-minor
labels.description: a problem which doesn't affect the package's usefulness, and is presumably trivial to fix

body:
despite error message suggesting to be able to do so
```shell
$> datalad install --reckless= ds000001         
usage: datalad install [-h] [-s SOURCE] [-d DATASET] [-g] [-D DESCRIPTION]
                       [-r] [-R LEVELS] [--nosave]
                       [--reckless [auto|ephemeral|shared-...]] [-J NJOBS]
                       [PATH [PATH ...]]
datalad install: error: argument --reckless: invalid constraint:({None, True, False, 'auto', 'ephemeral'} or shared-...) value: ''

$> datalad install --reckless=false ds000001
usage: datalad install [-h] [-s SOURCE] [-d DATASET] [-g] [-D DESCRIPTION]
                       [-r] [-R LEVELS] [--nosave]
                       [--reckless [auto|ephemeral|shared-...]] [-J NJOBS]
                       [PATH [PATH ...]]
datalad install: error: argument --reckless: invalid constraint:({None, True, False, 'auto', 'ephemeral'} or shared-...) value: 'false'

$> datalad install --reckless=no ds000001   
usage: datalad install [-h] [-s SOURCE] [-d DATASET] [-g] [-D DESCRIPTION]
                       [-r] [-R LEVELS] [--nosave]
                       [--reckless [auto|ephemeral|shared-...]] [-J NJOBS]
                       [PATH [PATH ...]]
datalad install: error: argument --reckless: invalid constraint:({None, True, False, 'auto', 'ephemeral'} or shared-...) value: 'no'

$> datalad install --reckless=0 ds000001 
usage: datalad install [-h] [-s SOURCE] [-d DATASET] [-g] [-D DESCRIPTION]
                       [-r] [-R LEVELS] [--nosave]
                       [--reckless [auto|ephemeral|shared-...]] [-J NJOBS]
                       [PATH [PATH ...]]
datalad install: error: argument --reckless: invalid constraint:({None, True, False, 'auto', 'ephemeral'} or shared-...) value: '0'

```
